title: Checkpoint Harmony Endpoint
description: Checkpoint Harmony Endpoint is a next generation endpoint security designed to prevent, detect, and respond to threats on user devices (desktops, laptops, servers)

definition.content:
**Check Point Harmony Endpoint** is an advanced **Endpoint Detection and Response (EDR) and Endpoint Protection Platform (EPP)** solution from Check Point. It protects Windows and macOS endpoints (like laptops, desktops, and servers) against a wide range of cyber threats using both **signature-based and behavior-based** technologies.

**Key Features**
-   **Anti-Malware & Anti-Ransomware**: Blocks and auto-recovers from threats
-   **Exploit Prevention & Sandboxing**: Stops zero-day attacks
-   **Data Protection**: USB control, file blocking, full disk encryption
-   **Forensics**: Attack timeline and rollback
-   **Central Management**: Cloud (Infinity) or On-Prem (SmartEndpoint)
Displays informational logs about authentication like log in and log out sessions.
Displays logs containing Ransomeware, Anti malware that belongs to the forensic category of the Harmony Endpoint.
